name: Trump Loves Waifus
description:
This game is a parody. No political opinion is promoted here.
All the girls in this game have over 21 years old.

Main Game Mode :
In each map we must find 7 keys to free Trump who has been imprisoned.
Next to that we have a secondary objective which is to complete a certain amount of kills, which will be
random.

Pleasure Mode :
No combats there to enjoy in with calm
Adjust the camera angle for do the best screenshot possible and to excite your senses.


Trump need to be safe of dangerous waifus, take your guns be brave!
